p: After removing non-independent samples (known or suspected offspring of other individuals within the dataset), cytb analyses and microsatellite analyses (at 17 loci) were performed on data from 544 and 502 individuals, respectively ( Table 1). Abbreviations for population groupings used in analyses are CT (all continental populations), CB (all continental populations plus Bioko), IS (all four island populations), iIS (three isolated island populations (São Tomé, Príncipe and Annobón)) and STP (São Tomé and Príncipe) ( Supplementary Fig. S3).
